A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie alone is good\, but for those like me\, who loves the star wars universe and the lore of the franchise is a kick in the balls. the movie is full whit plot holes and whit a humor that many times is so bad\, it feels like a different movie\, but not a star wars movie\, and what they did to Luke in this movie is just so so bad.
